title: 06/28/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 06/28/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP is joined by the Pro Football Hall Fame President C. David Baker, who announces that the long time voice of NFL Films, John Facenda will be inducted into the Hall of Fame. Reggie Miller makes his weekly pit stop to recap last night's Sixers/Hawks game and preview tonight Suns/Cippers Game 5. What are the chances we'll see Kawhi again during these playoffs? And Hall of Famer / Bulls great Scottie Pippen doesn't pull any punches when asked if Phill Jackson is a racist and whether or not Michael Jordan was selfish for pursuing a baseball career.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP is joined by the Pro Football Hall Fame President C. David Baker, who announces that the long time voice of NFL Films, John Facenda will be inducted into the Hall of Fame. Reggie Miller makes his weekly pit stop to recap last night's Sixers/Hawks game and preview tonight Suns/Cippers Game 5. What are the chances we'll see Kawhi again during these playoffs? And Hall of Famer / Bulls great Scottie Pippen doesn't pull any punches when asked if Phill Jackson is a racist and whether or not Michael Jordan was selfish for pursuing a baseball career.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
